casebody.data:
MENITES, INC., d/b/a Theo's Bar and Grille, Theodore Kalathas, and Mosca Kalathas, Petitioners
v.
WHTM ABC27 NEWS, Media General, Inc., James Crummel, Amanda St. Hilaire, Respondents No. 760 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 27, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 27th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
